title: How to Stream Video to Xbox One

steps.headline: Turn on the Xbox One.
steps.description: Locate the power button and press to turn on the console.

steps.headline: Open the Apps menu.
steps.description: You can find this on the "Start" screen.

steps.headline: Install the Video App.
steps.description: Select the Xbox Video App. Select "Install."

parts.name: Streaming Videos to the Xbox One

steps.headline: Go to "Settings" and navigate to the "Preferences" section.
steps.description: Under the "System and App" section, enable the option labeled "Allow Play to Streaming."

steps.headline: Select a video file on your PC.
steps.description: This will be file you want to stream.

steps.headline: Select Xbox One on the drop-down list that will appear.
steps.description: The video will automatically play on your TV with the help of the Xbox One.

text: Downloading the Xbox Video App Turn on the Xbox One. Locate the power button and press to turn on the console. Open the Apps menu. You can find this on the "Start" screen. Install the Video App. Select the Xbox Video App. Select "Install." Streaming Videos to the Xbox One Go to "Settings" and navigate to the "Preferences" section. Under the "System and App" section, enable the option labeled "Allow Play to Streaming." Select a video file on your PC. This will be file you want to stream. Right-click the video file. Select the "Play To" option. Select Xbox One on the drop-down list that will appear. The video will automatically play on your TV with the help of the Xbox One.
